amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide exclusions for when an M&A broker is not exempt from registration with the SEC.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-414 to provide exclusions for when a mergers and acquisitions broker is not exempt from registration with the SEC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Sherman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
